content:
A late San Antonio couple donated  million to the Oklahoma State University Foundation to provide funding for the schools Presidents Distinguished Scholarships PERIOD



Horace and Norma Cleveland left the money in their will along with money endowed to several other nonprofit organizations PERIOD



The gift will provide funding for about  students to receive the scholarship PERIOD



 said Becky Krause Foundation
